Running Novaland LocallyÂ¶

To run Novaland on your computer, follow these steps:

  1. Clone the repository: .. code-block:: bash

    git clone <your-repo-url> cd Novaland

  2. Create a virtual environment and install dependencies: .. code-block:: bash

    python -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate # or venvScriptsactivate on Windows pip install -r requirements.txt

  3. Run the oTree server: .. code-block:: bash

    otree devserver

  4. Open the browser at http://localhost:8000
